鬘字的基本解释

鬘
mán
美好的头发。
戴在身上作装饰的花环：“贯雹为华鬘。”

鬘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mán］
［《廣韻》莫還切，平删，明。］
(1)秀美的头发。
(2)缨络之类装饰品。印度风俗，男女多取花朵相贯，以饰身或首。

鬘字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【髟字部】　鬘； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1456第27
【廣韻】莫還切【集韻】謨還切，?音蠻。衣也。【韻補】纓絡也。【酉陽雜俎】天女九退相九髮散麤澀。又脣動不止，瓔珞花鬘皆重。【白居易·悟眞寺詩】貫雹爲華鬘。又【酉陽雜俎】四婇女如影等，各有十二億那由他侍女，壽五千歲，地名月鬘。　又【集韻】謨官切，音瞞。【類篇】髮美貌。

鬘字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鬘字的起名意思

形容发美。

鬘
Basic explanation of words
鬘
mán
Beautiful hair.
A garland worn on the body for decoration: "Guanhai is a Hualiu."
鬘
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [mán]
["Guangyun" Do not cut it, delete it plainly, and make it clear. ]
(1) Beautiful hair.
(2) Decorations such as Yingluo. In Indian custom, men and women often take flowers to intersect to decorate their bodies or heads.
鬘
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji Chapter 1】【Xianzi Department】　鬘; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1456-27
[Guang Yun] Mo still cut [Ji Yun] Mo still cut,? The sound is man. Clothes also. 【Rhyme Filling】Yingluo also. 【Youyang Miscellaneous】The goddess' nine retreat phases and nine radiate roughness. And the lips move more and more, and Yingluo's flowers are heavy. 【Bai Juyi·Wu Sui Temple Poems】Guanhai is Huahuan. Also 【Youyang Miscellaneous】Four maids are like shadows, each has 1.2 billion Nayuta maids, five thousand years old, and the place name is Yuehua.　[Jiyun] Moguan cuts, and the sound is concealed. [Classes] Make a beautiful appearance.
